mapper.select: select sm.menu_id id, sm.menu_name name, sm.parent_id, sm.parent_name, sm.icon, sm.url from sys_user_role sur join sys_role_menu srm on sur.role_id = srm.role_id and sur.user_id = #{userId} join sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id order by sm.sort
select menu_id id, menu_name name, parent_id pid, parent_name pname, icon, url from sys_menu order by sort

SELECT sm.menu_id id, sm.menu_name title, sm.parent_id parentId, case when exists(select 1 from sys_role_menu srm where srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id and srm.role_id = #{roleId}) then 1 else 0 end checked FROM sys_menu sm
